query:
-- Usar hash de senha123 do usuário Lucas
UPDATE users 
SET passwordHash = (SELECT passwordHash FROM users WHERE email = 'lucas@example.com' LIMIT 1)
WHERE email = 'lucio@example.com';

-- Criar paciente Miguel vinculado ao Lúcio
INSERT INTO patients (name, birthDate, diagnosis, familyUserId, createdAt)
VALUES ('Miguel Santos Silva', '2018-05-15', 'TEA Nível 1', 
  (SELECT id FROM users WHERE email = 'lucio@example.com'), NOW());

-- Buscar IDs
SELECT u.id as userId, p.id as patientId 
FROM users u 
LEFT JOIN patients p ON p.familyUserId = u.id 
WHERE u.email = 'lucio@example.com';
